headline: NXP Semiconductors (NXPI) Increases Despite Market Slip: Here's What You Need to Know

headline: NXP Semiconductors Bets Big On Auto Connectivity With $242.5 Million Aviva Links Deal
summary: NXP Semiconductors N.V. (NASDAQ:NXPI) shares are trading slightly lower on Tuesday in the premarket session. The firm announced that it has entered into a definitive agreement to acquire Aviva Links, a provider of advanced in-vehicle connectivity solutions, in an all-cash transaction valued at $242.5 million. This acquisition is aimed at expanding NXP’s position in the automotive industry, particularly in the areas of advanced driver-assistance systems and in-vehicle infotainment. Aviva Links sp

headline: NXP to Acquire Automotive Networking Pioneer Aviva Links, Accelerating Asymmetrical ASA Multi-Gigabit Connectivity in Software Defined Vehicles
summary: NXP announced today that it has entered into a definitive agreement to acquire Aviva Links. NXP expands its automotive networking & connectivity portfolio with the acquisition of Aviva Links, a pioneer of ASA-based asymmetrical links for ADAS and IVI applications.
